类的使用
Jest.Card

使用Card的程序包 
程序包 说明
Jest  

  • Jest中Card的使用

    Jest中Card的子类 
    修饰符和类型 类 说明
    class  Joker
    Joker is a kind of card so it extends the class Card.
    class  SuitCard
    SuitCard is a kind of card so it extends the class Card.
    类型参数类型为Card的Jest中的字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    java.util.LinkedList<Card> GameTable.Trophy
    Trophy is a linked list of cards which formed the trophy.
    返回Card的Jest中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    Card Player.getfaceupOffer()
    To get the face-up offer of the player.
    返回变量类型为Card的类型的Jest中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    java.util.LinkedList<Card> Player.getJest()
    To get the Jest of the player.
    java.util.LinkedList<Card> Player.getOffer()
    To get the Offer of the player.
    参数类型为Card的Jest中的方法 
    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    void Player.addOffer​(Card card)
    The game table add offers to each players when dealing cards.
    void Player.addToJest​(Card card)
    To add a card to the Jest of the player.
    boolean Card.cardEquals​(Card card)
    cardEquals(Card card) allows to compare if the present card is same to a card sent in as parameter.
    boolean Card.comCard​(Card card)
    comCard(Card card) only compares value and suit when deciding the order of taking offers
    boolean Card.compareCard​(Card card)
    compareCard(Card card) is for STRATEGY design pattern.
    void HumanPlayer.makeOffer​(Card card)
    The human player faces up a card to make offers
    void Player.setFaceUp​(Card card)
    To set one of the Offer face-up.
